title: AbstractWiki Architect Frame Schema: Relational – Membership / affiliation
description: Schema for the rel.membership-affiliation frame: group membership and affiliation relations (member–group).

frame_type.description: Canonical frame type identifier for membership / affiliation relations.

frame_family.description: Optional high-level family label; always relational for this frame.

member.description: The entity that is a member or affiliate (X).

group.description: The group, organization, party, or team that X belongs to (Y).

id.description: Optional identifier for this membership relation (e.g. upstream statement ID).

relation_type.description: High-level label for the relation, e.g. member, player, supporter, employee.

role_label.description: Optional more specific role label within the group, e.g. goalkeeper, chairperson.

start.description: Optional coarse timespan indicating when the membership or affiliation begins.

end.description: Optional coarse timespan indicating when the membership or affiliation ends.

status.description: Optional status label such as current, former, honorary.

certainty.description: Confidence in the fact, between 0.0 and 1.0.

source_id.description: Optional identifier for the upstream source (e.g. Wikidata statement ID) from which this relation was derived.

extra.description: Free-form metadata bag for project-specific extensions.

entity.description: Generic entity reference (person, organization, place, etc.).

id.description: Local identifier for the entity, if any.

qid.description: External identifier such as a Wikidata QID.

kind.description: Optional kind label (e.g. person, organization, party, team).

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the entity.

timespan.description: Coarse time span with optional year, month, and day fields.
